headline: NextEra Energy announces date for release of first-quarter 2025 financial results
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NEE) today announced that it plans to report first-quarter 2025 financial results before the opening of the New York Stock Exchange on Wednesday, April 23, 2025, in a news release to be posted on the company's website at www.NextEraEnergy.com/FinancialResults. The company will issue an advisory news release over PR Newswire the morning of April 23, with a link to the financial results news release on the company's website. headline: ClearBridge Global Infrastructure Income Strategy Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Infrastructure delivered positive returns in Q1, outpacing both global equities and U.S. equities, which were weaker amid higher policy uncertainty, specifically around tariffs.
